name: InterConsult Bulgaria
tagline: We Help You Digitize Your Business
description: InterConsult Bulagria Ltd (ICB) is a leading Bulgarian software and consulting provider with more than 19 years of market presence. The company offers high quality services in the fields of management and IT consulting, software design and development, maintenance, support and end customer training. ICB has more than 350 successfully delivered projects in leading Bulgarian companies and in technological giants abroad.
